full_summary:
**Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Bearings, Screws, O-rings, Gaskets, and Pistons**
=====================================


A competitive tender is invited by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the procurement of multiple Victoria-class spares, including bearings, screws, O-rings, gaskets, and pistons. This tender announcement is referenced under solicitation number [W8482-242274/A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27750/w8482-242274-a---amendment-001_1.pdf) [([W8482-242274-A - Amendment 001_1 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27750/w8482-242274-a---amendment-001_1.pdf)); A supralector de pièces de rechange de classe Victoria incluant des roulement, vis, joint torique, joint et piston.


The DND invites bids for the procurement of multiple spares, determined by the Global Supply Network (GSIN) and NATO Stock Number (NSN). A total of 20 items are listed in the tender, each with specific quantities and NSNs.

There are no Canadian Free Trade Agreements (CFTA) attached to the notica.

Multiple Victoria-Class Spares: Bearings, Screws, O-rings, Gaskets, and Pistons
=====================================



## Tender Overview

A competitive tender is invited by the Department of National Defence (DND) for the procurement of multiple Victoria-class spares, including bearings, screws, O-rings, gaskets, and pistons.

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: [W8482-242274/A](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files
